result.adr_address: Yuriya Kondratyuka St, 2, Kyiv, Ukraine, 04201
result.name: Fora

reviews.text: It's a very small store that doesn't have many items. I've bought bad milk twice in a week here. Don't know what's going on...the store did take care of the problem and were friendly. The staff are the usual unhappy food market workers, but they are at least nice and friendly. This store needs more space for items...but for what it does have, the prices are good.

Today at 20:00 I came in with my child to get groceries. In the store, out of 2 cash registers, 1 was working and there was a queue, and the employee was talking to her colleague. We decided to go to the self-service cash register and 2 cash registers needed an assistant. Someone punched his product and left. I asked who can remove this product so that I can break mine. To which I received an answer that I should drop everything and come to you. Such a relationship is not permissible. If this woman does not want to perform her duties properly, why is she working here at all. Have conversations with your ill-mannered employees. They will receive funds not for what they lose to buyers.

It is located almost in my yard. The assortment is high, there are always many profitable promotions, vegetables and fruits are always fresh. I like going because there is a family atmosphere, all the salespeople and consultants are familiar. This is not the case in other markets. Probably the most convenient store in my area, and there are also 2 ATB and 3 Silpo, just for a minute. Not counting other grocery...

On September 5, 2023, came to the store, needed to buy some products and a set of razors. Arriving at the self-service checkout and starting to scan the products, I noticed that the price tag for a set of razors is significantly different from the price tag on the counter. I asked the representative of the store nearby to find out the reason why the price at the register was not at all the same as the price tag on the product. The employee of the store immediately went to the rack with razors and immediately pulled out the price tag, and also contemptuously and mockingly began to conduct a dialogue, saying that they forgot to replace it and whether I will buy the product according to the price tag on the cash register. I asked this employee to call the manager of the store, to which she replied that the manager was on vacation and she was the deputy manager. I wanted to buy the product according to the price tag that was indicated on the shelf, to which I received the answer "why should I give my money", I replied that I do not need the employee's "money" at all, at the same time, I need the product at the price indicated on price tag, the dialogue continued for about 2 minutes in approximately this direction. The assistant manager of the store once again turned around honorably and rudely, and left with the words "I will now bring and give my money." I put all the goods on the nearest shelf and left without waiting for the "deputy store manager". Since that moment, I have not returned to this store and do not intend to return.
P.S. In this store, price tag inconsistencies were encountered quite often, both from my side and from the side of other visitors to the store (I was a witness).
Appeal to the "Fora" network:
1. Teach employees how to communicate with people, as well as how to communicate in the store in the state language, as required by current legislation.
2. Monitor the compliance of price tags and the quality of customer service in the store.
3. Pay more attention to the personnel policy of the store.
//////
I DO NOT RECOMMEND the store, because in addition to the rude attitude of the staff, "irrelevant" price tags, spoiled mood, you, as a person carrying money to this store, will not get anything. Given that there are 3 Silpo stores and an ATB store nearby, I would recommend going there.

The price tags do not correspond to the real prices, when asked to solve this issue, the cashier replied that she could not help. Last time I visited this miserable store. As you can see from the reviews, the administration put a big bolt on customer reviews, as the situation does not change
